remarks: Induction step for constructing a substitution instance of ~ ax-c15 without using ~ ax-c15 .  Quantification case.  When ` z ` and ` y ` are distinct, this theorem avoids the dummy variables needed by the more general ~ ax12inda .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2007.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ax12inda2.1 $e |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( x = y -> ( ph -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
ax12inda2 $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( x = y -> ( A. z ph -> A. x ( x = y -> A. z ph ) ) ) ) $.
$d y z $.
